    • Method Detail

      • alternateIntents

        public MessageRequest.Builder alternateIntents(Boolean alternateIntents)
        Sets the alternate intents flag. Set to true to return all matching intents
        Parameters:
        alternateIntents - the alternate intents flag
        Returns:
        a builder object

      • build

        public MessageRequest build()
        Generates a new MessageRequest object. It will contain the parameters set in the builder.
        Returns:
        a MessageRequest instance

      • context

        public MessageRequest.Builder context(Map<String,Object> context)
        Sets the context/state which is to be sent to the message API as a part of the service request. Each response from the message API returns a context object which represents the state as defined by the service. The state is not maintained by the service, so the client must keep the state from each API call, and pass that state in as a part of any subsequent requests.
        Parameters:
        context - a map containing key value pairs representing the state/context of the conversation
        Returns:
        a builder object

      • input

        public MessageRequest.Builder input(Map<String,Object> input)
        Sets the input which is to be sent to the message API as a part of the service request. Typically the input will contain a text property (key and value). The text property is generally interpreted as being the user/system input which the service must parse for intents, entities etc..
        In advanced cases the client may pass in more than just text as a part of the service input. For the majority of cases calling the inputText(String) method is sufficient to send text to the service on behalf of the user/system.
        Parameters:
        input - a map of properties to be sent to the service under the input property
        Returns:
        a builder object

      • entity

        public MessageRequest.Builder entity(Entity entity)
        Adds an entity to the list of entities to be send as part of the request.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the builder

      • entities

        public MessageRequest.Builder entities(List<Entity> entities)
        Sets the list the entities to be send as part of the request.
        Existing entities will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        entities - the entities
        Returns:
        the builder

      • intents

        public MessageRequest.Builder intents(List<Intent> intents)
        Sets the list the intents to be send as part of the request.
        Existing intents will be replaced.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the builder

      • inputText

        public MessageRequest.Builder inputText(String text)
        Sets the input text which is to be sent to the message API as a part of the service request.
        Parameters:
        text - the textual value to be assigned to the 'text' property on the input object.
        Returns:
        a builder object
